synopsis.text: Nano's life takes an unexpected turn when she, a beloved teacher, finds herself entangled with her mischievous student, Souji. Initially set up on a blind date, Nano is smitten by the charming man she meets, only to discover that he is none other than Souji, the troublemaker from her class. Despite her attempts to distance herself from him, Souji's relentless pursuit continues, even going as far as posing as his own brother to secure a marriage proposal. As Nano grapples with the shocking revelation and Souji's persistent advances, she finds herself drawn to him, her body yearning for his touch. Will Nano be able to resist the charms of her student and maintain her professional boundaries, or will she succumb to the allure of forbidden love?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
